vehicles.description: A dark-colored car traveling in the same direction as the ego car on the same road lane.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle affects the driving behavior as it sets the pace for the ego car and the distance to be maintained.

vehicles.description: A white car is driving ahead of the ego car in the same direction on the right side of a two-lane road
vehicles.explanation: The presence of this car directly ahead on the shared pathway affects the speed and following distance of the ego car.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Multiple pedestrians are visible on the right sidewalk, parallel to the roadway, with no immediate signs of entering the roadway
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Pedestrians near the road require monitoring in case they unexpectedly enter the roadway.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Workers wearing high visibility vests are present at the side of the road where the traffic cones are located, indicating active work or maintenance
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The presence of road workers might lead to dynamic changes in the roadway environment, and the ego car should be prepared for people stepping into the road or operation of equipment.

traffic signs.description: A temporary speed limit sign showing '20' is placed on the right side of the road.
traffic signs.explanation: It signals a reduced speed area, likely due to roadwork or other temporary conditions, requiring the ego car to slow down to the indicated speed limit.

traffic cones.description: A series of orange and white traffic cones are placed on the right edge of the roadway, extending into the lane ahead of the ego car
traffic cones.explanation: The cones indicate a road work area or potential hazard, necessitating reduced speed and increased caution.

barriers.description: Red and white temporary barriers on the right side of the road, in conjunction with the traffic cones.
barriers.explanation: These barriers likely denote a construction zone which may have workers present and possibly uneven road surfaces.

suggestions: Given the road users and signs present, the ego car should reduce speed to comply with the temporary '20' speed limit sign, maintain vigilant awareness of the cyclists and roadside workers, and prepare for potential stop-and-go traffic due to the vehicles ahead. Overtake the cyclist only if there's sufficient space to do so safely and without entering the opposite lane, given the traffic cones and barriers which may narrow the lane. Stay alert for any unexpected movements by the roadside workers.
